Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • snake.MainMenu

  • public class MainMenu
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainMenu()
      Initializes the ImageView objects for the 4 menu screens

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.image.ImageView getMenu() 
      boolean getMusic() 
      boolean getSFX() 
      void turnOffMusic()
      Sets the music var to false and chooses the right menu image based on whether or not the SFX is on or off
      void turnOffSFX()
      Sets the SFX var to false and chooses the right menu image based on whether or not the music is on or off
      void turnOnMusic()
      Sets the music var to true and chooses the right menu image based on whether or not the SFX is on or off
      void turnOnSFX()
      Sets the SFX var to true and chooses the right menu image based on whether or not the music is on or off
